Body: Possible Duplicate:  When will my device get the Android 4.0 update (Ice Cream Sandwich)?  I have a Samsung Galaxy S WiFi 5 (YP-G70), it currently has 2.3 installed on it.I would love to get the newest Android version (4.0) on it. Is this possible by ANY way?
Title: Is there a way to upgrade my Galaxy to ICS (even by rooting)?

history.Text: I have a Samsung Galaxy S WiFi 5 (YP-G70), it currently has 2.3 installed on it.I would love to get the newest Android version (4.0) on it. Is this possible by ANY way?
Is there a way to upgrade my Galaxy to ICS (even by rooting)?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [When will my device get the Android 4.0 update (Ice Cream Sandwich)?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/14766/when-will-my-device-get-the-android-4-0-update-ice-cream-sandwich)  I have a Samsung Galaxy S WiFi 5 (YP-G70), it currently has 2.3 installed on it.I would love to get the newest Android version (4.0) on it. Is this possible by ANY way?
